Nope,  it's not your computer problem. That's happening to me too.

I thought I should wait til' Monday when both TPG's and RIOT's  technical staffs working so they would look into it. It turned out TPG said it's Riot's server problem and Riot said the issue is resolved where actually it is not.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/K6yHzQIK-resolved-login-issues-912015

They obviously doing nothing  but looking at the comments that some people saying changing DNS server works for them, thus they think the issue has been resolved!
I've tried every single thing like flushing DNS, changing DNS server, running as admins, remove air_client, restart my router, etc. None of them working and it's been 3 days!

FIX:
go to control panel > network and internet > network and sharing center

click change adapter settings 
right click the adapter you're using for your internet conection and go to properties
click on Internet Protocol Version 4 (TCP/IPv4)
click properties
check "use the following DNS server address"
for preferred DNS server enter 8.8.8.8
leave alternate.
click OK.
Enjoy league.
Have you tried the suggestions from the other threads about flushing DNS, or trying another DNS server?
